info.name: Mystic Tiles
info.attribution:

info.description: Move and flip tiles to match the patterned cards in your hand. Highest score wins.
info.helpText:
Sit in seats. Click the reset button to begin.

Drag and drop a tile onto an adjacent tile and they will swap automatically.

The other side of the tile is indicated in a small image in the lower right.

Scoring is automatic when dropping a scoring card into the holder below the seat, but the value can be manually edited.  The score does not take into account the 3-point bonus at the end of the game for the player(s) with the most 1-point cards.

End the game after each player has had an equal number of turns in the turn in which a player gets the following number of scoring cards:
  2 players: 10 cards
  3 players: 9 cards
  4 players: 8 cards
  5 players: 7 cards

Solo mode: When only one player sits is in a seat and the reset button is pressed, solo mode is started. A smaller deck of 16 cards is available and a reminder of how to win is added to the in-game text.

fields.text: Are you sure you want to restart the game?
This will recall and shuffle the discard pile only. Are you sure you want to continue?

actions.html:
Actions During Turn

Skip Turn

Skip your turn and draw 2 cards from the deck. You cannot skip twice in a row.


Swap Tiles

Switch places of two tiles by dragging one of the tiles to an adjacent (not diagonal) tile. Discard one of your cards.


Flip Tiles

Flip a tile over by clicking on it. Discard one of your cards.


Score

Move a card that matches a pattern of tiles on the board to the score holder beneath your seat.


End Turn

End your turn by pressing the black and white turn button to refill your hand to 4 cards.

actions1P.html:
Solo Mode

Win by scoring all 16 cards before getting 4 strikes. End turn without scoring = 1 strike. Click on square to left to indicate a strike.
